dict.string: Starting with iPadOS 13 you can have multiple windows and app instances. Open your ownCloud accounts side by side, show a file preview in a new window or drag and drop files between two accounts. All windows will be restored, after the app was launched.
On iOS 13 the last opened folder or file will be restored, after the app was launched. On iPadOS 13 all windows will be restored, after the app was launched.
On iPadOS you can control the app with a hardware keyboard. Long press the command key to see all available actions. These actions can change, if an item is selected or not.

The integrated Media Player autoplays all media files from the current folder. The media player was improved, to show available album covers. Furthermore you have now controls, to skip 10 seconds forward or backward. If you have an Apple Watch, you can control the media playback right from your wrist.
We replaced the file preview rendering engine. Now you can display more file types directly in the app. Furthermore you can get better preview icons for more file types.
Now the app is also available in Arabic language
All sort types got a second sort parameter alphabetically.
On iPad the Share Sheet did not appear, if the selected item was out of the first visible file list page
Some file types (Collabora Office) can't be opened or saved via FileProvider
Allows browsing of folders in the File Provider while in Airplane mode with Files app.
Fixes some problems regarding the auto photo and video upload. The app is now more responsive, when uploading a huge amount of files.
Fix: Passcode Lock Screen on iOS 13

Scan your documents directly into your ownCloud. You do not longer need a third party app or import scanned documents. Our ownCloud app has an integrated document scanner. Tap on the "+" button to start your scan!
Annotate, sign or draw in your PDF files and Images direclty in the app. So easy and all your files stays in your cloud.
On iOS 13 you get great Shortcut support. We have added multiple action, to build your own scripts and automation for your ownCloud.
We added some more quick access collections to get faster access to your specific file types.
There is a smaller and cleaner file list layout to show more informations.
The sort bar is now also present in the Directory Picker view.
We fixed the UI restoration, when last opened path no longer exists. Sorry!
On iPad the Share Sheet did not appear, when trying to share a log file.
The Save Action got a new parameter "Overwrite existing File".
Sometimes the edited document was not saved, when edit mode was not disabled.
Fixed some problems, when device is in flight mode.
Fixed a problem, when device was offline and an available offline resource was changed on an other device.
Show and perform actions only, when permission was granted.
With iPadOS 13.4 we supporting mouse and trackpads
Fixed saving, when device is in flight mode.
Open items will be automatically updated if the content was changed
